title: (x) John Lennon and Yoko Ono "War is Over!" poster - (similar to) Franklin Gothic {Marc O}
content:
I'm trying to do a spinoff of the John Lennon and Yoko Ono "War is Over" poster.

I'm sure it's obvious, but nothing I've tried looks quite right.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100216090633im_/http:/typophile.com/files/warisover_6067.jpg)

Thanks,  
Zach
author: Zach

comments.content: Except for the S, this is very Franklin Gothic Condensed.
Could just be an American gothic that never made it to digital... Franklin, News and Trade Gothic all come close.
I think Franklin Gothic Condensed will work - thanks!
